SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, COUNT, CREATE_DATE, ORIGIN_NAME, RNUM FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, COUNT, CREATE_DATE, ORIGIN_NAME, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, COUNT, CREATE_DATE, ORIGIN_NAME, ROWNUM RNUM FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS ='Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 11 AND 16;
